thread.title: Chicago archbishop calls for stronger gun regulations
thread.title_full: Chicago archbishop calls for stronger gun regulations - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Chicago archbishop calls for stronger gun regulations
text: CHICAGO (AP) - Chicago Archbishop Blase Cupich (blayz SOO'-pich) is calling for stronger gun regulations in the wake of mass shootings around the nation and street violence in the city. Cupich wrote a commentary published in the Chicago Tribune (http://trib.in/1hwIIqF) over the weekend. He writes that the Second Amendment's authors ... ...
